filteredArticles.headline: Penn Med study shows financial incentive can help physicians receive opioid training
filteredArticles.abstract: After receiving the training, the study found that 65% of physicians reported administering or prescribing the treatment within five months.

filteredArticles.headline: University's retrieval policy draws mixed reactions from on-campus residents
filteredArticles.abstract: Some students, having been unable to retrieve belongings from their dorms for months, are frustrated by Penn Residential Servicesâ€™ recently announced procedures for letting students retrieve, store, or ship their items.

dominantMedia.title: Move Out Penn Residential Services.jpg
dominantMedia.content: Students who have not moved out from the College Houses may return to campus between June 4 and June 13 to retrieve their belongings, or have their items packed and stored at no cost.
